fontManagerTab.title: Font Manager
fontManagerTab.hint: From here, installed fonts can be previewed and GM-added fonts can be removed.
fontManagerTab.unknownIconHover: Honestly, no idea how this got here.

addFontTab.title: Add a Font
addFontTab.hint: Add a font from the Google Fonts API to Foundry. Browse available font families on
addFontTab.inputHint: Enter the exact name of a single font, then press Add Font.

fvttFontsDefaultFontsVisibleSetting.label: Enable 📜 Fonts Default Font Pack
fvttFontsDefaultFontsVisibleSetting.hint: This module comes with a selection of free fonts. Disable this pack if you would prefer not to see these fonts in the Font Manager.

dungeondraftFontsVisibleSetting.label: Enable Dungeondraft Font Pack
dungeondraftFontsVisibleSetting.hint: Dungeondraft, the mapping tool by Megasploot, comes with 25 default fonts. By enabling this pack and then selecting the specific fonts you want in the Font Manager, your drawing and map notes in FoundryVTT can match the labels on your Dungeondraft maps.

categorySortSetting.label: Sort Fonts in Dropdowns by Category
categorySortSetting.hint: By default, all fonts are sorted alphabetically in UI dropdowns. Enable this setting to sort by category instead, with default Foundry fonts first.

panagrams.panagram-1: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
panagrams.panagram-3: Glib jocks quiz nymph to vex dwarf.
panagrams.panagram-4: Sphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.
panagrams.panagram-5: Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
panagrams.panagram-6: The five boxing wizards jump quickly.
panagrams.panagram-7: Jackdaws love my big sphinx of quartz.
panagrams.panagram-8: Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim.
panagrams.panagram-9: A wizard's job is to vex chumps quickly in fog.
panagrams.panagram-10: By Jove, my quick study of lexicography won a prize!

addFontSave.empty: No font submitted, no change made.
addFontSave.invalid: {newFont} was not found on Google Fonts.
